Name: Get Address From Name

Table: Test Table

UI Type: Desktop

Type: onChange

Field Name: Name

Description: Client Script to populate the Address field on the Test Table form.

 

Script:

//*****Start of Script*****

function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
return;
}

var location = 'CS:Get Address From Name';

// On demand load of the UI Script.
// 1. You must have the scope, the script name (no spaces), and .jsdbx as the script name
// 2. You will use the built-in class name to access the functions in the UI script (sic. utils)
// - this is not the name of the script, but the class name in the script
// 3. If you make any changes to the UI Script you will need to change the name of the script
// incrementing it numerically is what I usually end up doing so ClientUtils1. You will then
// need to change everything calling into the ui script. This is because there is a bug in the
// getScripts function that breaks the call and requires you change the name. You cannot reuse
// a previous name!
try {
ScriptLoader.getScripts('x_cdltd_theapplica.ClientUtils.jsdbx', followup); //NOTE: Name change may apply
} catch (err) {
g_form.addErrorMessage(err);
}

function followup(result) {
try {
utils.getAddress(newValue, 'address');
} catch (err) {
g_form.addErrorMessage('---> ERROR: ' + err);
}
}
}

//*****End of Script*****
